subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kobe Bryant scored 41 points in a physical and emotionally charged game against the Nuggets, including a 3-point shot over J.R. Smith with just over a minute left to play.
snippet: Kobe Bryant scored 41 points in a physical and emotionally charged game against the Nuggets, including a 3-point shot over J.R. Smith with just over a minute left to play.
